1.text: Place the stained fabric facedown on a few paper towels.

2.text: Blot the stained area with acetone.

6.vid: /8/86/Get Nail Polish out of Fabric Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Use a clean cloth to blot the polish.
7.vid: /6/60/Get Nail Polish out of Fabric Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Rinse the area with warm water.
